title: Overused Champions that I Never Want to See in OFA Again
body:
{{champion:103}}{{champion:74}}{{champion:203}}{{champion:99}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}}

I am not going to argue whether these champions are broken or useless in OFA. My complaint with the mode is that these are the most overused champions in the mode and I don't ever want to see them in the mode again.

replies.body: Thanks for the refreshing new thread!

The sarcasm is real...

I just posted another one. I'M SORRY, THIS IS STILL PISSING ME OFF.

Could you maybe post a thread about how you think ARAM needs a ranked mode, or that all champions should be unlocked for ARAM?

This forum needs more threads, and since you've got a penchant for creating pointless new threads instead of contributing to an existing thread, I figured...
